Title: Mutual care and love, share life - main topic of the 2003 International Aids Movement
Publisher: Weishengbu yibing kongzhisi (卫生部疫病控制司), Durex
Notes: This poster was co-produced by the Ministry of Hygiene (Weishengbu yibing kongzhisi) and the Durex company, producer of contraceptives. The man is Pu Cunxin (濮存昕), famous actor and goodwill ambassador in China's campaign against HIV/AIDS.
